short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focused destination search directly integrated into your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Book Hotels SRC" is a convenient Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience by providing quick access to destination information. Whether you're planning a trip or simply curious about different locations, this extension allows you to effortlessly search for destinations without leaving your current webpage.

Key Features:

Instant Destination Search: Easily search for destinations from any webpage without interruption.
Floating Widget: Access the search widget conveniently located on the right side of your browser window.
Drag-and-Drop Functionality: Move the widget anywhere on your screen for optimal viewing.
Auto-Submit: Automatically submit your search query after entering more than three characters with a 500ms delay.

With "Book Hotels SRC," exploring new destinations and planning your next adventure is just a click away. Install now to streamline your browsing experience and discover new places effortlessly!
